Package Controller

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    Crack
    When the brick get impact but not broken, the brick crack
    DebugConsole
    Use for easy debug
    DebugPanel
    use to check the game
    GameBoardController
    controller of game board, listen to key and mouse of the user and give responses
    GameFrame
    set up JFrame for the game
    HighScoreController
    controller for high score listen to mouse of the user and give responses
    HomeMenuController
    controller for home menu, mouse listener and mouse motion listener for home menu
    InfoController
    Controller for the info, listen to mouse of the user and give responses
    Levels
    to set up the bricks according to the level
    PlayerController
    controller for player, set up player in game
    Time
    Use to record time taken
